Content:: Franck Bonnamour (born 20 June 1995) is a French cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam B&B Hotels p/b KTM.[3][4] His father, Yves Bonnamour, was also a professional cyclist. He rode and completed his first grand tour in the 2021 Tour de France, in which he placed 22nd overall was given the overall combativity award, despite not having been awarded any individual stage combativity award.[5][6]
Title: Franck Bonnamour - Wikipedia
